content: Operating cash flow during the first quarter of 2021 suffered from the significant negative impact of the Texas freeze event, which resulted in a net loss for that quarter of $4.4 million. Adjusted EBITDA was $5.8 million for the first quarter compared with $5.2 million in the first quarter of 2021 and negative $0.1 million in the first quarter of last year. Adjusted EBITDA for Specialty Petrochemicals in the first quarter was $5.9 million compared to $6.4 million in the fourth quarter of 2021 and $2.6 million in the first quarter of 2021. Specialty Waxes segment generated revenues of approximately $12.6 million in the first quarter compared to $9.1 million in the fourth quarter and $8.7 million in the first quarter of 2021. Specialty Waxes segment had adjusted EBITDA of $1.9 million in the first quarter compared to $0.2 million in the fourth quarter of 2021 and a negative $0.5 million in the first quarter of last year. Custom processing fees were approximately $2.7 million in the first quarter of 2022, that's up from $1.8 million from the prior year's first quarter.
